title: Immune Boost Mist
description: Keep your immune system strong and healthy with our Immune Boost Essential Oil Mist. Made with 100% natural ingredients, this mist is perfect for daily use and helps to boost your body's defenses. Order now from Gypsy Rose Holistic.
cleaned_text: Immune Boost Mist [Gypsy Rose Holistic](/collections/vendors?q=Gypsy%20Rose%20Holistic) Immune Boost Essential Oil Mist, 50mL A natural body and room mist made from essential oils to strengthen and improve your immune system. Create an aromatherapy sanctuary wherever you go with well-being in each mist. - Strengthens immune system - Eliminates germs and airborne pathogens including Strep, parasites + fungi - Improves allergies - Aids in liver, kidney + gallbladder cleansing - Removes heavy metals - Balances hormones + adrenal fatigue Organically grown oils. No additives or fillers. Vegan + cruelty free. All oils are non-GMO, paraben free artificial fragrance free, and GC/MS
